title: I got snared by Morgana
body:
So I minimized my League window, watched a full episode of the Monkey King series, played a game of Dota, ate my dinner, read a Shakespeare play, finished the entire Lord of the Rings series, went back to league... and I'm still snared.

And no, its not overdone until it's actually fixed.

http://sk2.op.gg/images/medals/challenger_1.png
